content.prompt: The sentiments expressed in the excerpt best reflect which of the following divisions within the Civil Rights movement?

choices.label: Optimism among White people in the United States that racial discrimination was being eliminated
Growing support among young activists in the Civil Rights movement for nonviolent protest
Frustrations among Civil Rights activists that social and political change was not occurring fast enough
Tensions within the federal government over the best way to combat communist influence in Civil Rights movements

topic.text: 8.10: The African American Civil Rights Movement (1960s)

skill.text: Skill 5.B: Explain how a historical development or process relates to another historical development or process.
